desc.p: Fields INDEX to RATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 amount field.
A maximum of 18 characters may be entered.
Fields INDEX to RATE form a related multi value set. This is a sub valued language field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Fields INDEX to RATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SC.INDICES file.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
